revised_title: Description of a Camelopardalis Found near the Cape of Good Hope
tldr: Captain Carteret shares a detailed description and drawing of a rare Camelopardalis found near the Cape of Good Hope. The animal, also known as a giraffe, was last seen in Europe during Julius Caesar's time. Carteret provides measurements and details of the animal, emphasizing its rarity and the need for further study and documentation.
